title: 1 Corinthians
content:
Paul’s First Letter to the Corinthians

Purpose

To clarify some questions the Corinthian church had raised and to address a series of specific problems that had arisen in the church there

Author

Paul

Date

AD 53–56

Setting

Written from Ephesus during Paul’s third missionary journey, in response to reports and questions he had received from the church in Corinth (see 1 Corinthians 1:11; 5:1; 7:1; 8:1; 12:1; 16:1)
